img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Mamma Mia! CANCELLED!

div.div: Mamma Mia! CANCELLED!

Mamma Mia has been Cancelled. As a result of the need to exercise caution with regard to large public gatherings, related to the spread of the coronavirus, the weekend performances of Mama Mia, the BFUHS Drama Club's Spring Musical, have been cancelled
